name: They'll Find You
description:
A retro horror game that places you as a small child against a variety of monsters in an isolated mansion.

You wake up from a nap in the back seat to discover that you're alone in the middle of a strange wreck.
Your goal now, is to navigate the labyrinth of a house nearby, to find your family.
The creatures that await you are not freindly & are on the patrol for any survivors.
Just remember, if you're not careful...
They'll Find You

On your journey, you must collect screws & electronic keys, necessary for unlocking a mechanical door located upstairs.

Your only means of attack, should your aim be true is a bow located in the game room. Arrows can be found scattered around the house.
